DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare pharmacokinetics between Pitavastatin and Valsartan co-administration and Livalo fixed combination drug in healthy male subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of LivaloÂ® Fixed Combination Drug in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteers Age 2055 years at the time of Screening BMI 1926 kg/m2 at the time of Screening Received other investigational drug within 90 days prior to the first dose of study drug
